TopicTitle: How much dV does a Kerbalnauts EVA RCS pack have?

Articles.Content:
As the title says. Just wondering If Dillan has enough dV to make Tylo orbit once his lander runs out of gas....

Edited February 20, 2014 by StrandedonEarth
If I recall correctly it's about 500m/s, assuming you aren't trying to push something. I hope Dillan's close to orbit already!
One question has been bugging me ever since .23 came out: Was the EVA jetpack's ÃŽâ€v decreased in .23?
Tanks for the quick answer. Probably would have been enough if I didn't break my nukes on landing

One question has been bugging me ever since .23 came out: Was the EVA jetpack's ÃŽâ€v decreased in .23?

No, they have 600m/s the only thing that changed is they now use EVA fuel, which can be transferred between kerbals on EVA.

One question has been bugging me ever since .23 came out: Was the EVA jetpack's ÃŽâ€v decreased in .23?

I don't believe so. From what I've observed so far, the only real change has been cosmetic (in the way jetpack fuel is displayed as a full resource).
